text: @Sheheryarbanuri @navift @ImranKhanPTI Where was consideration for the poor during dharne lockdown tho? Anyway, poor are MORE vulnerable being exposed to infection if outside. You can't earn if you're dead. Hesitation for lockdown is futile. The govt will eventually lockdown anyway (not before wasting valuable time).
